attributes.additional_details:
The Central Government of China is seeking to undermine "One Country, two system" in Hong Kong which was guaranteed in the Sino-British Declaration in 1984.
The White Paper issued by the Information Office of the State council of the People's Republic of China, made bold statement that infringe the rule of law and violate the principle of "One Country, Two System".
I wish the UK government would review the recent events that is threatening Hong Kong's autonomy and uphold the Sino-British Declaration to defend the rights and freedom given to Hong Kong and its people.
